Name: InstanceNormalizationNode
Description: Node that does instance normalization. This is normalization across channels.

Properties.Name: mean
Properties.Description: Mean of the normalized outputs. Default 1.

Properties.Name: stddev
Properties.Description: Standard deviation of the normalized outputs. Default 1.

Properties.Name: imported
Properties.Description: Whether this node has been imported or not.

Properties.Name: inputChannels
Properties.Description: Number of channels of 2 dimensional images per input.

Functions.Name: __init__
Functions.Description: init function sets up key variables.

Functions.Name: newLayer
Functions.Description: Creates a new layer instead of importing the layer.

MandatoryArgs.Name: connections
MandatoryArgs.Description: List of nodes. All nodes after first will be ignored

Functions.Name: execute

MandatoryArgs.Name: inputs
MandatoryArgs.Description: A tf.Tensor from each input connection.

Functions.Description: Performs instance normalization on the last axis of the inputs

Functions.Name: exportNode

MandatoryArgs.Name: path
MandatoryArgs.Description: Path the network is being saved to.

MandatoryArgs.Name: subdir
MandatoryArgs.Description: Subdirectory within path where this layer is being saved to.

Returns.Description: The access path used. This is used for overloading.

Functions.Description: Exports ID, and connections. Checks directory existence and validity.

MandatoryArgs.Name: myPath
MandatoryArgs.Description: Path the network is being saved to. Has to be called myPath to avoid a collision.

MandatoryArgs.Name: subdir
MandatoryArgs.Description: Subdirectory within path where this layer is being saved to.

Returns.Description: The access path used. This is used for overloading.
A list of node IDs to connect to this node. This is because the connections can only be resolved when all nodes have been imported.
